configuration.title: nadesiko3Highlight
maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.
enablePluginFromRemote.description: Enable import javascript plugin from remote.
enableNako3FromRemote.description: Enable import nako3 file from remote.
runtimeUseShebang.description: Use runtime mode from shebang line
node.nodeBin.description: When launch node cnako3/snako, node binary file path
wnako.csp.enable.description: When execute wnako, enable CSP in viewer
wnako.csp.useNonce.description: When enable CSP, set nonce for internal use script tag
wnako.canvas.preset.description: When execute wnako, precreate canvas tag
